text: (ohugē ema putā) ohu samaga pā gamanin ævidiya hæki vayasa at vū viṭa, ohu (tama putāṭa) “magē dayābara putunē! ættenma mā obava (magē atin) khella kapā bili dena bavaṭa, mā (magē) sihinen duṭuvemi. (mē gæna) oba kumana adahasak darannehida?”yi vimasuvēya. eyaṭa ohu “magē (dayābara) piyāṇeni! obaṭa dena lada niyōgayaṭa anuvama oba karanu. allāh adahas kaḷahot (eya vin̆da darāgena) sthīra vaśayen siṭinneku bavaṭa, oba māva dakinnehiya” yayi pævasuvēya
